author: PixelTracksAlpaka
body:
#### PR description:

This PR stems from #41117 and it's the 3rd of a series of smaller PRs.  

- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41282
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43295
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41285
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41286
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41287
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41288
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43294

It includes all the needed additions to run pixel local reconstructuction from RAW to Hits. It adds all the needed `DataFormats` and the plugins in `RecoLocalTracker`. It also adds the needed `ESProducts` amd `ESProducers` in `CondFormats` and `CalibTracker`.
 
Keeping track of the comments in https://github.com/PixelTracksAlpaka/cmssw/issues/41
title: Pixel Alpaka Migration: Local Reconstruction [III]
